item.description:
CONSCIOUS MOVIES AND MEANINGFUL CONVERSATION - Hope to see you there!
All are Welcome!

@ The Center of Light - 7:30PM FREE
97 Perkins Street in Jamaica Plain
call 617-794-8208 for information or to register

A viewing and discussion of the award-winning film Whale Rider
In this captivating and haunting tale, 12-year-old Pai must overcome powerful traditions as she tries to assume her destiny as the leader of a tribe on the New Zealand coast. Among numerous international distinctions, Whale Rider was nominated for two Academy Awards and was the winner of the 2003 Sundance Film Festival World Cinema Audience Award.
item.name: Conscious Movie Meetup! May Meetup
